VarDecl.Name: semanticId
VarDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Output semantic id that comes from one the argument in the @Semantic attribute.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: OnContextFinishedAsync
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Called when the node is parsed successfully before restarting colorizing.</summary> <param name="context">The result of the parsing.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: OnSemanticColorize
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Called when a @SemanticColor attribute in a grammar is activated during colorizing to determine a color for the token. If there is an <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::RepeatingParsingExecutor::IParsingAnalyzer@s:vl.presentation.controls.RepeatingParsingExecutor" /></links> binded to the <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::RepeatingParsingExecutor@s:vl.presentation.controls.RepeatingParsingExecutor" /></links>, this function can be automatically done.</summary> <param name="context">Context for doing semantic colorizing.</param> <param name="input">The corressponding result from the <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::RepeatingParsingExecutor@s:vl.presentation.controls.RepeatingParsingExecutor" /></links>.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: EnsureColorizerFinished
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Call this function in the derived class's destructor when it overrided <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiGrammarColorizer::OnSemanticColorize(& SemanticColorizeContext,& const RepeatingParsingOutput)@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiGrammarColorizer" /></links>.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GuiGrammarColorizer
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create the colorizer with a created parsing executor.</summary> <param name="_parsingExecutor">The parsing executor.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GuiGrammarColorizer
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create the colorizer with a specified grammar and start rule to create a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::RepeatingParsingExecutor@s:vl.presentation.controls.RepeatingParsingExecutor" /></links>.</summary> <param name="_grammarParser">Parser generated from a grammar.</param> <param name="_grammarRule" /> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetColor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the color for a token theme name (@Color or @ContextColor("theme-name") in the grammar).</summary> <returns>The color.</returns> <param name="name">The token theme name.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetColor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set a color for a token theme name (@Color or @ContextColor("theme-name") in the grammar).</summary> <param name="name">The token theme name.</param> <param name="entry">The color.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetColor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set a color for a token theme name (@Color or @ContextColor("theme-name") in the grammar).</summary> <param name="name">The token theme name.</param> <param name="color">The color.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetParsingExecutor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the internal parsing executor.</summary> <returns>The parsing executor.</returns> </Document>
